016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.providers;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.json.JsonElement;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.MediaTypes;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.JsonApiRels;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.ResourceDocument;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerator;
023import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
024import com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.yaml.YAMLFactory;
025import jakarta.inject.Singleton;
026import jakarta.ws.rs.Produces;
027import jakarta.ws.rs.WebApplicationException;
028import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
029import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MultivaluedMap;
030import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter;
031import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
032
033import java.io.IOException;
034import java.io.OutputStream;
035import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
036import java.lang.reflect.Type;
037
038@Singleton
039@Provider
040@Produces({MediaType.WILDCARD})
041public class JsonElementMessageBodyWriter
042        implements MessageBodyWriter<JsonElement> {
043
044    private static final MediaType APPLICATION_JSON_API_TYPE = MediaType.valueOf(MediaTypes.APPLICATION_JSON_API);
045    private static final MediaType APPLICATION_JSON_SCHEMA_TYPE = MediaType.valueOf(MediaTypes.APPLICATION_JSON_SCHEMA);
046    private static final MediaType APPLICATION_YAML_TYPE = MediaType.valueOf(MediaTypes.APPLICATION_YAML);
047
048    private final ObjectMapper objectMapper;
049    private final ObjectMapper yamlObjectMapper;
050
051    public JsonElementMessageBodyWriter() {
052        this.objectMapper = new ObjectMapper();
053        objectMapper.configure(JsonGenerator.Feature.AUTO_CLOSE_TARGET, false);
054        this.yamlObjectMapper = new ObjectMapper(new YAMLFactory());
055        yamlObjectMapper.configure(JsonGenerator.Feature.AUTO_CLOSE_TARGET, false);
056    }
057
058    @Override
059    public boolean isWriteable(Class<?> type, Type genericType, Annotation[] annotations, MediaType mediaType) {
060        return JsonElement.class.isAssignableFrom(type) &&
061                (mediaType.isCompatible(APPLICATION_JSON_API_TYPE) ||
062                 mediaType.isCompatible(APPLICATION_JSON_SCHEMA_TYPE) ||
063                 mediaType.isCompatible(APPLICATION_YAML_TYPE) ||
064                 mediaType.isCompatible(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_TYPE));
065    }
066
067    @Override
068    public void writeTo(JsonElement jsonElement, Class<?> type, Type genericType, Annotation[] annotations,
069                        MediaType mediaType, MultivaluedMap<String, Object> httpHeaders,
070                        OutputStream entityStream) throws IOException, WebApplicationException {
071
072        if (jsonElement instanceof ResourceDocument rd) {
073            rd.getLinks().getByRel(JsonApiRels.describedby).ifPresent(link ->
074            {
075                httpHeaders.add("Link", String.format("<%s>; rel=\"%s\"; title=\"%s\"", link.getHref(), link.rel(), "JSON Schema"));
076            });
077        }
078
079        if (mediaType.isCompatible(APPLICATION_YAML_TYPE)) {
080            yamlObjectMapper.writer().writeValue(entityStream, jsonElement.json());
081        } else {
082            objectMapper.writer().withDefaultPrettyPrinter().writeValue(entityStream, jsonElement.json());
083        }
084    }
085}
